001package edu.pdx.cs410J.datesAndText;
002
003import java.time.LocalDateTime;
004import java.time.temporal.ChronoField;
005
006public class LocalDateTimeExample {
007
008  public static void main(String[] args) {
009    LocalDateTime now = LocalDateTime.now();
010    System.out.println("Now: " + now);
011
012    int dayOfYear = now.get(ChronoField.DAY_OF_YEAR);
013    System.out.println("Day of Year: " + dayOfYear);
014
015    LocalDateTime yesterday = now.minusDays(1);
016    System.out.println("Yesterday: " + yesterday);
017
018    LocalDateTime newYears = LocalDateTime.of(2024, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0);
019    System.out.println("New Years: " + newYears);
020  }
021}
